name: English
author: Dragoteryx#0407
test2: This is only available in english
noResults: Sorry but I did not find anything.

permissions.info:
Permissions are given following the attribution of 3 roles:
Admin => have `Admin` permission or role `drb-admin`
Moderator => role `drb-mod`
DJ => role `drb-dj` (if you want everyone to have DJ permissions don't create this role)
permissions.error: you don't have the necessary permissions (`$REQUIRED`). To learn how permissions work use `$PREFIXpermissions`.

errors.guildOnlyCommand: You can't use this command in private channels.
errors.ownerOnlyCommand: This is an owner only command.
errors.missingPermissionsCommand: You don't have the necessary permissions.
errors.voteRequiredCommand: To use this command you need to vote for the bot: $VOTELINK
errors.nsfwCommand: What are you trying to do?
errors.wrongSyntax: Use `$PREFIXhelp $COMMANDNAME` to learn how to use this command.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occured. Please contact `$OWNERTAG`. `$PREFIXserver` to join the test server.

music.addedToPlaylist: `$TITLE` by `$AUTHOR` has been added to the playlist.
music.unexpectedFormat: This video ID doesn't match the expected format.
music.queryChoice: So, which one do you want to listen to?
music.queryNumber: You need to enter an index between `1` and `$NBVIDEOS`.
music.noResFirstOne: You didn't respond in time, so I'll play the first one.
music.memberNotInVoiceChannel: You're not in a voice channel.
music.voiceChannelNotJoinable: I can't join this voice channel.
music.voiceChannelNotSpeakable: I'm not allowed to speak in this voice channel.
music.guildAlreadyJoined: I'm already in a voice channel.
music.notConnected: I am not in a voice channel.
music.askToJoin: You can ask me to join you using `$PREFIXjoin`.
music.notPlaying: I am not playing any music at the moment.
music.invalidMusicIndex: There is no music with that index in the playlist.
music.unknownWebsite: Sorry but I don't know this website.
music.memberJoined: Someone joined, staying for a little longer.
music.leaveInactivity: The voice channel is empty, I will leave in `one minute`.
music.invalidYoutubePlaylistLink: This playlist link is not valid.
music.youtubePlaylistFetched: The playlist `$TITLE` has been added to the current playlist.
music.removedFromPlaylist: `$TITLE` has been removed from the playlist.
music.skipped: The current music (`$TITLE`) has been skipped.
music.clear1: `1` music has been removed from the playlist.
music.clearMore: `$NB` musics have been removed from the playlist.
music.loopingOn: The current music (`$TITLE`) is now looping.
music.loopingOff: The current music is no longer looping.
music.playlistLoopingOff: The playlist is no longer looping.
music.volumeSet: The volume has been set to `$VOLUME%`.
music.title: Title
music.author: Author
music.playlistDisplayCurrent: Use `$PREFIXcurrent` to have information about the current music.
music.oneResult: I only found one video so I'll play this one.

help.description: You probably know what this command does or else you wouldn't be reading this.
help.takeALook: take a look at your private messages!
help.unknownCommand: This command doesn't seem to exist. Use `$PREFIXhelp` to get a list of all commands.
help.info:
Options between brackets are `required`. Those between parenthesis are `optional`.
If you need some help, use `$PREFIXserver` to join the test server.
You can also use `$PREFIXhelp [command]` to obtain help about one particular command.

reset.description: Reset the bot to its default values. (language and prefix)

prefix.description: Show the current prefix, or set a new one.
prefix.set: My prefix has been set to `$PREFIX`.
prefix.guildonly: you can't set a new prefix here.

lang.description: Show the list of languages available, or set a new one.
lang.list: you can choose between one of those languages:
lang.guildonly: you can't set the language here.
lang.unknown: this language doesn't exist or the bot doesn't support it.

request.description: Request a Youtube video using a link.

plremove.description: Remove a music from the playlist.

volume.description: Set the volume of the music.

fact.noResults: I did not find any interesting fact sorry.
fact.offline: I'm not in the mood for this right now. Try again later. :grimacing:

roll.description: Roll a dice, invalid dice sizes will roll a 6.

reflex.description: The first user to react wins.
reflex.rules: I will post a message, the first to respond with the correct number wins!
reflex.bots: bots are not authorized to play this game. That's cheating!

waifu.description: Get to know who your waifu is.
waifu.theTruth: your waifu doesn't exist and if she did she wouldn't like you.

encrypt.specificKey: Do you want me to use a specific key ? If you do reply with the key within `10` seconds.

decrypt.keyRequest: Do you happen to know the key ? Reply with the key to decrypt this message within `20` seconds.
decrypt.unknownKey: If you don't know the key I can't decrypt this message.
decrypt.wrongKey: This doesn't seem to be the right key to decrypt this message.
